com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.avatar

Class AvatarService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.App42Service
      • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.avatar.AvatarService

  • public class AvatarService
extends App42Service
    App42 Avatar Service allows you to manage avatars in your App. Using avatar management you can create your own avatar or import from Facebook and any other web media. You can also manage your avatar like change your current avatar or history of your previous avatars.
    Author:
    Shephertz

      • createAvatar

        public Avatar createAvatar(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String userName,
                  java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  FileExtension extension)
                    throws App42Exception
        Upload your own avatar with input stream.
        Parameters:
        name - - Name of avatar to be created.
        userName - - Name of the user who is creating avatar.
        inputStream - - InputStream of the file to be creating avatar.
        description - - Description of the avatar.
        extension - - Extention of the image. e.g:- GIF, PNG, JPG.
        Returns:
        Avatar Object
        Throws:
        App42Exception

      • updateAvatar

        public Avatar updateAvatar(java.lang.String avatarName,
                  java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String newAvatarName,
                  java.lang.String description)
                    throws App42Exception
        Updates avatar name and description of existing avatars from app.
        Parameters:
        avatarName- - Name of the avatar for which you want to update.
        userName - - Name of the user for which you want to update his avatar.
        newAvatarName- - Name of the new avatar.
        description- - Add New description about the avatar or put null to remain old.
        Returns:
        Avatar Object
        Throws:
        App42Exception
